rooms.name: Entrance Hall and Verandah
rooms.description: Spacious area with a small reception area that follows Vastu principles for positive energy, featuring large openings aligned with cardinal directions.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open-concept living area adjacent to the entrance hall, well-lit by windows placed on the east side per Vastu, ensuring natural light and ventilation.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional kitchen integrated with dining space, with openings oriented towards the north to maximize energy flow according to Vastu.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy guest bedroom designed for occasional use; includes a small balcony overlooking the garden area, ensuring privacy and adherence to local norms.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: Storage area for kitchen utensils, cleaning supplies, integrated seamlessly with the main house layout while maintaining aesthetic harmony.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: Dedicated home theater room on ground floor, acoustically treated and designed as a multipurpose space following Vastu guidelines by placing audio-visual equipment in the north-east corner for optimal energy flow.

rooms.name: Outdoor Courtyard/Verandah
rooms.description: An open courtyard that connects various rooms, provides natural lighting, ventilation, and acts as an extension of living spaces per local norms and Vastu principles.
